body:
### Problem

```
=================================================================
==967422==ERROR: AddressSanitizer: heap-use-after-free on address 0x7d5435ce6958 at pc 0x555ee6ea968e bp 0x7ffe4f7f51b0 sp 0x7ffe4f7f51a8
READ of size 4 at 0x7d5435ce6958 thread T0
    #0 0x555ee6ea968d in emit_termrequest **/src/nvim/terminal.c:240:13
    #1 0x555ee6d99b75 in state_handle_k_event **/src/nvim/state.c:118:7
    #2 0x555ee68b3dc5 in nv_event **/src/nvim/normal.c:6653:3
    #3 0x555ee687e99c in normal_execute **/src/nvim/normal.c:1254:3
    #4 0x555ee6d99963 in state_enter **/src/nvim/state.c:100:26
    #5 0x555ee6861724 in normal_enter **/src/nvim/normal.c:523:3
    #6 0x555ee65e0c9f in main **/src/nvim/main.c:660:3
    #7 0x7f0436827634 in __libc_start_call_main /usr/src/debug/glibc/glibc/csu/../sysdeps/nptl/libc_start_call_main.h:58:16
    #8 0x7f04368276e8 in __libc_start_main /usr/src/debug/glibc/glibc/csu/../csu/libc-start.c:360:3
    #9 0x555ee5a00004 in _start (**/build/bin/nvim+0xc9f004) (BuildId: aeaf5b99668dc5494024e5cad8ced654f4264bf6)

0x7d5435ce6958 is located 8280 bytes inside of 8480-byte region [0x7d5435ce4900,0x7d5435ce6a20)
freed by thread T0 here:
    #0 0x555ee5b02b9d in free.part.0 asan_malloc_linux.cpp.o
    #1 0x555ee677f440 in xfree **/src/nvim/memory.c:159:3
    #2 0x555ee6e8b21e in terminal_destroy **/src/nvim/terminal.c:1074:5
    #3 0x555ee5ce5fd4 in term_close **/src/nvim/api/vim.c:1177:3
    #4 0x555ee6e89e55 in terminal_close **/src/nvim/terminal.c:627:7
    #5 0x555ee5d73705 in close_buffer **/src/nvim/buffer.c:645:5
    #6 0x555ee5dab31e in empty_curbuf **/src/nvim/buffer.c:1220:5
    #7 0x555ee5d8226f in do_buffer_ext **/src/nvim/buffer.c:1408:14
    #8 0x555ee5d89c44 in do_buffer **/src/nvim/buffer.c:1611:10
    #9 0x555ee5b7bf7a in nvim_buf_delete **/src/nvim/api/buffer.c:1028:16
    #10 0x555ee6557013 in nlua_api_nvim_buf_delete **/build/src/nvim/auto/lua_api_c_bindings.generated.h:1374:3
    #11 0x555ee730e835 in lj_BC_FUNCC (**/build/bin/nvim+0x25ad835) (BuildId: aeaf5b99668dc5494024e5cad8ced654f4264bf6)

previously allocated by thread T0 here:
    #0 0x555ee5b03e9d in calloc (**/build/bin/nvim+0xda2e9d) (BuildId: aeaf5b99668dc5494024e5cad8ced654f4264bf6)
    #1 0x555ee677f506 in xcalloc **/src/nvim/memory.c:173:15
    #2 0x555ee6e8534e in terminal_open **/src/nvim/terminal.c:455:30
    #3 0x555ee5ce5089 in nvim_open_term **/src/nvim/api/vim.c:1136:3
    #4 0x555ee65734aa in nlua_api_nvim_open_term **/build/src/nvim/auto/lua_api_c_bindings.generated.h:5809:17
    #5 0x555ee730e835 in lj_BC_FUNCC (**/build/bin/nvim+0x25ad835) (BuildId: aeaf5b99668dc5494024e5cad8ced654f4264bf6)

SUMMARY: AddressSanitizer: heap-use-after-free **/src/nvim/terminal.c:240:13 in emit_termrequest
Shadow bytes around the buggy address:
  0x7d5435ce6680: fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd
  0x7d5435ce6700: fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd
  0x7d5435ce6780: fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd
  0x7d5435ce6800: fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd
  0x7d5435ce6880: fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd
=>0x7d5435ce6900: fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd[fd]fd fd fd fd
  0x7d5435ce6980: fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd fd
  0x7d5435ce6a00: fd fd fd fd fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa
  0x7d5435ce6a80: fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa
  0x7d5435ce6b00: fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa
  0x7d5435ce6b80: fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa fa
Shadow byte legend (one shadow byte represents 8 application bytes):
  Addressable:           00
  Partially addressable: 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 
  Heap left redzone:       fa
  Freed heap region:       fd
  Stack left redzone:      f1
  Stack mid redzone:       f2
  Stack right redzone:     f3
  Stack after return:      f5
  Stack use after scope:   f8
  Global redzone:          f9
  Global init order:       f6
  Poisoned by user:        f7
  Container overflow:      fc
  Array cookie:            ac
  Intra object redzone:    bb
  ASan internal:           fe
  Left alloca redzone:     ca
  Right alloca redzone:    cb
==967422==ABORTING
```

### Steps to reproduce

1. Run `nvim --clean`
2. Source the following Lua file:
```lua
vim.api.nvim_create_autocmd("TermRequest", { callback = function() end })
local chan = vim.api.nvim_open_term(0, {})
vim.api.nvim_chan_send(chan, "\027]8;;https://example.com\027\\")
vim.api.nvim_buf_delete(0, { force = true })
```
3. ASAN detects a heap-use-after-free soon after

### Expected behavior

No heap-use-after-free

### Nvim version (nvim -v)

v0.12.0-dev-1953+g715015d3b2

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

N/A

### Operating system/version

Arch Linux

### Terminal name/version

kitty 0.44.0

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-kitty

### Installation

build from repo

labels.description: issue reporting a crash or segfault
labels.name: bug-crash

title: terminal: heap-use-after-free after deleting buffer with pending TermRequest
